Comment: Jointly with the Committee on General Welfare and the Committee on Courts and Legal Services

Items.Title: Oversight - Coordination of Services for Victims of Domestic Violence.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Coordination of Services for Victims of Domestic Violence.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.7964-B/S.5032-B, which would require wireless telephone companies that offer shared or family plans to allow victims of domestic violence to be released from the account without penalty in instances of domestic violence.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require wireless telephone companies that offer shared or family plans to allow victims of domestic violence to be released from the account without penalty in instances of domestic violence. (A.7964B/S.5032B)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Unified Court System to require the Integrated Domestic Violence Courts in New York City to issue regular reports on batterer intervention programs.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require the Integrated Domestic Violence Courts in NYC to issue regular reports on batterer intervention programs.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on General Welfare and the Committee on Courts and Legal Services
Resolution recognizing October as Domestic Violence Awareness Month in the City of New York.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognizing October as Domestic Violence Awareness Month in the City of NY.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to grant a presumption of eligibility for applicants to the shelter system who are exiting human resources administration domestic violence shelters.
